title: Issues with blocking websites
text:
Hey! First of all I think this app is very useful and has a great intent. However, I‚Äôve encountered issues with blocking websites. 

I use the browser version of social media because the annoying UI deters me from going on them so much. When I saw refocus I was so excited because it would give me another opportunity to hinder my social media habits. However, I was disappointed because the self-set unblocking timer does not remain accurate on websites. I‚Äôve found most times it fails to go off/reboock sites until much much longer than the timers I set (ex. I unblock for 3 minutes and it unblocks for 15-20). In apps, the timed unblocking feature  works excellently, but on websites it has proven extremely unreliable. If this were fixed I would be so grateful.

If it‚Äôs any use for the bug-fixing I‚Äôve encountered this issue using instagram.com and youtube.com on Google.

title: You will not regret downloading
text: Truly one of the best apps on my phone after using for more than a year - it has helped me reclaim my time, turn my phone into the tool it is meant to be instead of a distraction. I‚Äôve only used the free version and while the upgraded version seems to offer even better features, I have been able to get everything I need out of the free version with the scheduled blocking and optional timed blocking. It is so much more than and better than the simple time limit offered in my phone settings, which doesn‚Äôt block the time at which I can access apps, only how long I spend on them. Refocus does it all, even the free version. It creates a physical block between me and the apps that sap my time and take me away from important projects when it‚Äôs hard for me to make that decision myself. If you want to simplify your phone and reclaim your time I highly recommend using Refocus.

text: Monochrome app, keeps apps blocked all the time that I need blocked, and lets me use them when I need a few minutes, kicks me out if I go over. Snaps you out of that trance real quick.

title: This app is amazing
text: It was helpful to stay off my phone and get my work done

title: Great app!
text: Really like this app. Helps me stay focused. Blocks distractions when I need it.

title: Great free app
text: I like that the paid features are not pushed as much and this is probably the best app blocker out there!

text: Everyone thinks they need social media but this app makes it easy to discipline yourself to limit yourself to it. I‚Äôm glad I have it and I look forward to using it more.

title: Works great!
text: This app works great!

love it! it helps a lot with controlling my screen time while still allowing me to flexible at times when i need to use an app it‚Äôs blocking. definitely recommend!!

title: Great App
text: I use refocus for free and love it‚Äôs feature of being able to block apps and unblock them for a little bit with a click of a button. A very useful feature for when a blocked app actually has a messers use.

title: Best social blocking app

title: Functional app but pricey
text: The app has been begging me to write a review every time I open it, so here you go. I like the app, but the features that are worthwhile are locked behind a subscription. This is fine, except the subscription is about double what I would expect to pay for something like this.

title: Set your triple click button to greyscale!! Really intensifies the dopamine deterrent!!
text: Been using it for almost a month, love it. Tip:  if you set your iPhone volume button to grayscale after 3 clicks, paired with this app it really helps keep u away from social media.
